=====================================

**Snow Removal Services for Dufferin Terrace and Governors’ Promenade**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Number:** 5P300-23-0090/A
*   **Contract Title:** Snow Removal Services for Dufferin Terrace and Governors' Promenade
*   **Contract Category:** SRV (Services)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Contract Status:** Expired

### Description of Requirements

The contract involves providing snow removal and sanding services for the Promenade des Gouverneurs and Terrasse Dufferin. The work must be completed diligently to ensure that surfaces and entrances are always clear, ensuring safe traffic flow and access to buildings in case of emergencies. Snow must be manually cleared from stairs to protect them.

### Contract Period and Option to Extend

*   **Contract Period:** 3 years
*   **Option to Extend:** Up to 3 additional 1-year periods
*   **End Date:** April 15, 2026

### Mandatory Site Visit

A site visit has been arranged for September 14, 2023, at 9:00 am EDT at the Samuel de Champlain monument on Dufferin Terrace. Bidders must confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the representative(s). Failure to do so may result in non-response to the bid.

### Tender Submission

*   **Submission Method:** Fax or Email
*   **Email Address:** soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca
*   **Fax Number:** 1-877-558-2349

### Important Notes

*   National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
*   Bidders must base their bids on documents obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service or risk non-acceptance of their bid.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Submission of bids in French or English will be accepted.

Please review the submission details and requirements for the Snow Removal Services for Dufferin Terrace and Governors' Promenade contract.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or clarifications, please contact: 

Eric Robinson

Phone: 373355-0824

Email: [eric.robinson@pc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.robinson@pc.gc.ca)
